divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside smoking a cigarette and was looking into the sky when i observed what appeared to be a very bright star somewhat low to the ground (aprox. 1000 ft). Upon watching it for a minute the bright object dimmed to almost no light what so ever, at this point it has my full attention. As i continued to watch it moved like no aircraft i have ever seen going vertical and horizontal at incredible rates of speed. It also was flickering odd colors of light, I continued to watch until it faded into the distance when i came inside and Googled "UFO sightings in Michigan" and found this site i hope i can receive some sort of explanation for this occurrence. Sincerely yours J
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Romulus
There were no other sightings in Romulus on or around April 11th 2010
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: Saw a very bright light in the sky, thought it was a star...
